desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.
desc.jp: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}一行人要求{cf日步美}介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与{cf日步美}同行一段时间。另一方面，{cn便利屋68}的社长{cf亚瑠}，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。

desc.en: As Hifumi is more familiar with the Market, everyone asks her to lead the way for them.
desc.jp: As Hifumi is more familiar with the Market, everyone asks her to lead the way for them.
desc.zh_cn: 因为{cf日步美}对于黑市比较熟悉，众人于是邀请她为众人带路。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: The failed mission carried out by Problem Solver 68 shocks the PMC, who insists that the data must be wrong. Yet Black Suit thinks the data is nothing wrong and decides to investigate the reason.
desc.jp: The failed mission carried out by Problem Solver 68 shocks the PMC, who insists that the data must be wrong. Yet Black Suit thinks the data is nothing wrong and decides to investigate the reason.
desc.zh_cn: {cn便利屋68}任务失败，让PMC方面大为震惊，认为绝对是数据出了问题。黑服认为数据绝对无误，决定去调查具体原因。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Having failed the mission, as well as running out of money, the Problem Solver decides to turn to loan. Though Aru's account was suspended due to the wanted warrant issued by the Prefect Team, she seems to have her own way.
desc.jp: Having failed the mission, as well as running out of money, the Problem Solver decides to turn to loan. Though Aru's account was suspended due to the wanted warrant issued by the Prefect Team, she seems to have her own way.
desc.zh_cn: 任务失利加上资金耗尽，便利屋于是决定前去贷款。虽然{cf亚瑠}的账号已经因被{cn风纪委员会}通缉而被冻结，但{cf亚瑠}显然有自己的路子
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚瑠}用向{cn对策委员会}成员取得的钱攻击{sn阿拜多斯}高中。对此，{cf亚瑠}感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的{cf亚瑠}，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在{cf星野}面前，向她提出秘密交易。

desc.en: Aru is worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki can't understand why Aru doesn't take the money first, and Aru says it is because of the concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.jp: Aru is worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki can't understand why Aru doesn't take the money first, and Aru says it is because of the concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚瑠}一整晚对再战{sn阿拜多斯}一行人而担忧，{cf遥香}则布置好了炸弹。{cf无月}不解为什么{cf亚瑠}不先收钱办事，{cf亚瑠}则说是怕被客户干涉太多。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Someone purposes to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, that the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, will make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.
desc.jp: Someone purposes to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, that the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, will make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.
desc.zh_cn: 中间有人提出了回到{sn格黑娜}的选项，但{cf佳世子}谨慎分析了形势，认为由于有{cn风纪委员会}，尤其是{cf阳奈}的存在，他们几乎没有胜算，回去其实挺不实际的。

desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.zh_cn: 凯萨的干部出现在{cn对策委员会}面前，自称自己就是{sn阿拜多斯}的债权人。

desc.en: The PMC is too strong for everyone to escape. The director of PMC suddenly visits at this time, and Hoshino recognizes him and remembers something.
desc.jp: The PMC is too strong for everyone to escape. The director of PMC suddenly visits at this time, and Hoshino recognizes him and remembers something.
desc.zh_cn: PMC包围圈过于强大，众人无法脱逃。这时PMC理事突然到访，{cf星野}认出了他，记起了一些事情。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.en: The PMC director proposes to add the losses caused by everyone to the amount owed. Hoshino recognizes him, and the latter says hello to Hoshino. Then he "accidentally" leaks his hiring of the Problem Solver 68 and the Helmet Group. Afterwards, he says he wants to have a good talk with Abydos about the debt.
desc.jp: The PMC director proposes to add the losses caused by everyone to the amount owed. Hoshino recognizes him, and the latter says hello to Hoshino. Then he "accidentally" leaks his hiring of the Problem Solver 68 and the Helmet Group. Afterwards, he says he wants to have a good talk with Abydos about the debt.
desc.zh_cn: PMC理事提出要将众人造成的损失一并加入欠款金额中。{cf星野}认出了他，后者像{cf星野}问好，并“无意间”说出了自己雇佣便利屋和头盔团的事情。之后，他表示想和{sn阿拜多斯}好好谈论一下债务。

desc.en: After sending her enraged underclassmen home, Hoshino reveals to Sensei the secret deal she was offered by the man in the black suit. Sensei tries to console her, but the next day finds no trace of Hoshino, save for her resignation letter.
desc.jp: After sending her enraged underclassmen home, Hoshino reveals to Sensei the secret deal she was offered by the man in the black suit. Sensei tries to console her, but the next day finds no trace of Hoshino, save for her resignation letter.
desc.zh_cn: 把气愤的学妹们送回家后，{cf星野}把身穿黑西装的男人曾向自己提出秘密交易的事告诉老师。虽然老师替{cf星野}打气加油，但隔天{cf星野}却留下自动退学书消失踪影。

desc.en: Hoshino remembers the days with that former Student Union president. That president held a positive view of the future and believed that the future of Abydos would not be just like that. She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino interrupted her and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.
desc.jp: Hoshino remembers the days with that former Student Union president. That president held a positive view of the future and believed that the future of Abydos would not be just like that. She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino interrupted her and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}记起了和以前那位学生会会长的事情。那位会长对{cf未来}的一切充满希望，认定{sn阿拜多斯}的{cf未来}并非如此，还将以前庆典的一张海报给了{cf星野}。但{cf星野}打断并否定了她，还撕烂了手中的海报。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

desc.en: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.
desc.jp: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 梦是阿拜多斯前学生会的主席。她曾与星野一起工作，对未来抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一张与星野一起拍的合照上出现过。当前没有更多关于她的消息，但有些人认为她可能已经死了，如在第一篇和最终篇中所呈现的一样。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: Everyone still can't understand what PMC is looking for; after all, high value stuff like oils has long been proved to be non-existed. Shiroko says she wanted to investigate it first, but gets caught by Ayane to be having the previous idea. Hoshino advises everyone to calm down and return to take rests first.
desc.jp: Everyone still can't understand what PMC is looking for; after all, high value stuff like oils has long been proved to be non-existed. Shiroko says she wanted to investigate it first, but gets caught by Ayane to be having the previous idea. Hoshino advises everyone to calm down and return to take rests first.
desc.zh_cn: 众人还是不理解PMC究竟在找什么，毕竟石油之类的高价值物品已被探明并不存在。{cf白子}想先去调查一下，但被{cf绫音}识出可能实为去抢银行，遭到阻止。{cf星野}让大家冷静下来，先行回去休息。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Shiroko and Sensei waits into the night. Hoshino sends Shiroko away for "being too tired". Sensei remains in the classroom and takes out Hoshino's resignation application. Hoshino tries to move the problem onto Shiroko, but Sensei didn't let go. Hoshino agrees to talk about the situation, but first she would like to be out at the corridors.
desc.jp: Shiroko and Sensei waits into the night. Hoshino sends Shiroko away for "being too tired". Sensei remains in the classroom and takes out Hoshino's resignation application. Hoshino tries to move the problem onto Shiroko, but Sensei didn't let go. Hoshino agrees to talk about the situation, but first she would like to be out at the corridors.
desc.zh_cn: {cf白子}和老师等到很晚才离开。{cf星野}因疲劳打发走了{cf白子}，但老师并未离开。老师拿出了{cf星野}的退社信，{cf星野}想把问题转移到{cf白子}上，但老师紧追不放。{cf星野}同意向老师讲述情况，但得出去到走廊上。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: The sandstorm brings much dust into the school corridors. Hoshino coughs a few times and apologizes for the lack of manpower. Hoshino then mutters a few words. Sensei says that Hoshino seems to be really liking Abydos, but gets denied by the latter. Then, Hoshino tells Sensei about the "deal".
desc.jp: The sandstorm brings much dust into the school corridors. Hoshino coughs a few times and apologizes for the lack of manpower. Hoshino then mutters a few words. Sensei says that Hoshino seems to be really liking Abydos, but gets denied by the latter. Then, Hoshino tells Sensei about the "deal".
desc.zh_cn: 因为风沙太大，积尘严重，{cf星野}咳了几声，表示学校人手实在不够。{cf星野}之后又嘀咕了几句。老师说{cf星野}看上去非常喜欢{sn阿拜多斯}，后者则表示了否定。之后，{cf星野}向老师讲出了那个“请求”。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Hoshino suspects that PMC (especially the Black Suit) seems to be hiring some professionals. Hoshino says that she has never seen anyone like him in Kivotos, and it appears to her that even Kaiser Director fears him as well. As for the resignation application, Hoshino says it is nothing serious and rips it apart in front of Sensei. Hoshino says she'll made it clear for everyone, but also feels that it is the only option to accept that deal. Before leaving, Sensei makes a promise to Hoshino that he will eventually come up with solutions.
desc.jp: Hoshino suspects that PMC (especially the Black Suit) seems to be hiring some professionals. Hoshino says that she has never seen anyone like him in Kivotos, and it appears to her that even Kaiser Director fears him as well. As for the resignation application, Hoshino says it is nothing serious and rips it apart in front of Sensei. Hoshino says she'll made it clear for everyone, but also feels that it is the only option to accept that deal. Before leaving, Sensei makes a promise to Hoshino that he will eventually come up with solutions.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}推测PMC（尤其是黑服）似乎是在招募一些能手。{cf星野}表示她从没在基沃托斯见过他那样的人，而且似乎凯撒集团的理事也很怕他。至于退社信，{cf星野}表示只是脑袋一时糊涂，在老师面前撕掉了它。{cf星野}还表示明天会和大家说清楚，但又觉得接受那个请求似乎唯一无二。{cf星野}走前，老师承诺会想出解决方案。

desc.en: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.jp: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}在信上写说，为了免除{sn阿拜多斯}高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余{cn对策委员会}一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领{cf星野}消失踪影的{sn阿拜多斯}高中而来犯。

desc.en: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.jp: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}留下了退社书和一封信。在信中，{cf星野}向所有人坦白了去PMC做佣兵的事情，并说出了“（黑服）将会承担一半{sn阿拜多斯}债务”的事情。

desc.en: Hoshino signs at PMC office. Black Suit says that in this way, Hoshino will be transferring all her rights to him (in other words, Hoshino just sold herself), and promises the debt will be taken care as promised.
desc.jp: Hoshino signs at PMC office. Black Suit says that in this way, Hoshino will be transferring all her rights to him (in other words, Hoshino just sold herself), and promises the debt will be taken care as promised.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}在PMC办公室签了名。黑服表示，这样的话，{cf星野}就将自己所有的权利转移给了他（相当于卖了自己），并承诺债款将会如约承担。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Hoshino says that this is an responsibility that she should take, and hopes that in this way the Foreclosure Task Force would be less stressed. The letter ends here.
desc.jp: Hoshino says that this is an responsibility that she should take, and hopes that in this way the Foreclosure Task Force would be less stressed. The letter ends here.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}表示这是自己应该背负的责任，希望能够减轻{cn对策委员会}的压力。信在此终止。

desc.en: In another letter, Hoshino confesses that she does, neither like, nor believe adults. When Shiroko carried Sensei and arrived there, she was even disgusted; but eventually she trusted Sensei. She entrusted Shiroko to Sensei, hoping that Sensei could teach her well and don't let her make mistakes.
desc.jp: In another letter, Hoshino confesses that she does, neither like, nor believe adults. When Shiroko carried Sensei and arrived there, she was even disgusted; but eventually she trusted Sensei. She entrusted Shiroko to Sensei, hoping that Sensei could teach her well and don't let her make mistakes.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}在另一封信中坦白，自己并不喜欢大人，也不相信大人。在{cf白子}第一次将老师背来时，她甚至有点嫌弃，但最终她信任了老师。她还将{cf白子}托付给了老师，希望老师能教导管好{cf白子}，不要让她犯错。

desc.en: Hoshino gets on PMC's car, in which it would transport her to Abydos Desert.
desc.jp: Hoshino gets on PMC's car, in which it would transport her to Abydos Desert.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}登上了PMC的车，那里的车将会把{cf星野}运到{sn阿拜多斯}沙漠。

name.en: An Expectation of The Foreclosure Task Force
name.jp: An Expectation of The Foreclosure Task Force

desc.en: Hoshino hoped that everyone could protect Abydos well. She added that, if ever, ever that they would meet her on the battlegrounds, she wanted them to destroy her halo.
desc.jp: Hoshino hoped that everyone could protect Abydos well. She added that, if ever, ever that they would meet her on the battlegrounds, she wanted them to destroy her halo.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}希望大家能保护好{sn阿拜多斯}，并且，如果今后在战场上遇到她的话，能将她的光环破坏掉。

desc.en: Finishing reading, everyone is angry at Hoshino's irresponsibility. At this moment, they hears explosions coming outside.
desc.jp: Finishing reading, everyone is angry at Hoshino's irresponsibility. At this moment, they hears explosions coming outside.
desc.zh_cn: 读罢，众人对{cf星野}的“不负责任”非常生气。就在这时，他们听到外面传来爆炸声。

desc.en: PMC lead troops to disperse the citizens in Abydos, claiming that an order to leave immediately had been issued. As Hoshino, the former president of the former student union dropped out (i.e. being sold), the student union will not exist anymore, and as a result, the school will not, too.
desc.jp: PMC lead troops to disperse the citizens in Abydos, claiming that an order to leave immediately had been issued. As Hoshino, the former president of the former student union dropped out (i.e. being sold), the student union will not exist anymore, and as a result, the school will not, too.
desc.zh_cn: PMC带领部队前来驱散{sn阿拜多斯}地区的民众，宣称此处地方已经下达离开命令。由于作为前学生会成员的{cf星野}“退学”（被卖去凯撒），因而{sn阿拜多斯}学生会已名存实亡，{sn阿拜多斯}已不存在。

desc.en: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.jp: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.zh_cn: 抵达凯萨PMC的{cf星野}，听到{sn阿拜多斯}高中正遭受攻击的消息后表示抗议，但却反而被{cf黑色西装人}拘禁。在千钧一发之际，先前离开的{cn便利屋68}一行人出现在{sn阿拜多斯}，帮了{cn对策委员会}一把。

desc.en: Kaiser Director arrives and everyone is immediately triggered. Though claiming that they would be reported to the General Student Council, the director says it is useless and the time just proves that no one could be helping them. The director even points out that, due to Hoshino's dropout, Abydos High School is no longer existed. Everyone is shocked, but still argues with the existence of "The Foreclosure Task Force" - however, according to Ayane, since it is established after the dissolution of the Student Union, the Task Force is in fact a club that hasn't recognized officially. As a result, neither can it represent the school, nor can it be proved to be existed.
desc.jp: Kaiser Director arrives and everyone is immediately triggered. Though claiming that they would be reported to the General Student Council, the director says it is useless and the time just proves that no one could be helping them. The director even points out that, due to Hoshino's dropout, Abydos High School is no longer existed. Everyone is shocked, but still argues with the existence of "The Foreclosure Task Force" - however, according to Ayane, since it is established after the dissolution of the Student Union, the Task Force is in fact a club that hasn't recognized officially. As a result, neither can it represent the school, nor can it be proved to be existed.
desc.zh_cn: 凯撒理事闻声走来，众人对凯撒PMC的无理侵犯表示愤怒，但理事并没有被吓倒。虽然扬言要报告联邦学生会，但理事表示联邦学生会并没有用，而且这么长时间以来的事情也证明了没人来帮助他们。理事直接指出，由于学生会成员{cf星野}退学，{sn阿拜多斯}已不复存在，众人大惊。众人以“{cn对策委员会}”尚存抗争，但{cf绫音}表示，由于学生会当时已不存在，所以它并非官方认证的社团，因而实际上无法代表学校，也无法被证明存在。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: Hoshino is in great shock upon hearing PMC were attacking Abydos. The Black Suit explains that, after her dropout, Abydos will no longer have a student belonging to the Student Union, and therefore the school will not exist. The Black suit expresses his interest on establishing a new school purposed by PMC, but then clarifies that their goal is actually Hoshino herself. The fact of cooperating with Kaiser is simply because the interests aren't in conflict. The Black Suit says, as the highest "Mythic" in Kivotos, he will be carrying out experiments on her.
desc.jp: Hoshino is in great shock upon hearing PMC were attacking Abydos. The Black Suit explains that, after her dropout, Abydos will no longer have a student belonging to the Student Union, and therefore the school will not exist. The Black suit expresses his interest on establishing a new school purposed by PMC, but then clarifies that their goal is actually Hoshino herself. The fact of cooperating with Kaiser is simply because the interests aren't in conflict. The Black Suit says, as the highest "Mythic" in Kivotos, he will be carrying out experiments on her.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}听到PMC攻击{sn阿拜多斯}时震惊无比。黑服向{cf星野}解释，因为她自己退学，{sn阿拜多斯}就没有了学生会成员（即没有了学生会），由此学校已经不复存在。黑服表示了对PMC建立一所新学校的兴趣，但随后表示他们的目标实际上是{cf星野}自己，而与凯撒联手仅仅是因为利益不冲突罢了。黑服表示，作为基沃托斯最高的“神秘”，他将会对她进行实验。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Hanging on the experiment platform, Hoshino keeps her head low, resenting her own innocence. She feels sorry to everyone in the Foreclosure Task Force, as well as the former member Yume. Once again, she is deceived by adults.
desc.jp: Hanging on the experiment platform, Hoshino keeps her head low, resenting her own innocence. She feels sorry to everyone in the Foreclosure Task Force, as well as the former member Yume. Once again, she is deceived by adults.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}在实验台上，低着头，怨恨自己的天真。他对不起{cn对策委员会}的所有人，也对不起曾经的学生会成员梦前辈。再一次地，她被大人骗了。

desc.en: The director is surprised to hear that the Abydos are really going to pay the debts, but then he questions whether it would be meaningful or pointless. No one could give an answer - when the PMC troops are under a surprise attack.
desc.jp: The director is surprised to hear that the Abydos are really going to pay the debts, but then he questions whether it would be meaningful or pointless. No one could give an answer - when the PMC troops are under a surprise attack.
desc.zh_cn: 理事对{sn阿拜多斯}一行人居然真的并非嘴上说说，而是要真的还款一直感到震惊，但随后便反问能否做到以及这究竟有何意义。众人哑口无言，而这时PMC部队突然受到了意外攻击。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: Problem Solver 68 arrives upon hearing the explosions, acknowledging that the PMC was really out of line. Aru slams the Task Force for "giving up when your friends were in crisis", and repeats the motto that once the Masked Swimsuit Gang told her. In return for the help Abydos had made, Problem Solver 68 join in the battle.
desc.jp: Problem Solver 68 arrives upon hearing the explosions, acknowledging that the PMC was really out of line. Aru slams the Task Force for "giving up when your friends were in crisis", and repeats the motto that once the Masked Swimsuit Gang told her. In return for the help Abydos had made, Problem Solver 68 join in the battle.
desc.zh_cn: {cn便利屋68}闻讯赶到，认为PMC做的事情实在过于出格。{cf亚瑠}抨击{cn对策委员会}“在朋友遇到危机时居然就此放弃”，并复述了泳装蒙面团那时的座右铭。作为{sn阿拜多斯}一行人曾经帮助过他们的回报，{cn便利屋68}参与作战。

desc.en: Despite the Kaiser director's outrage, Sensei, the Foreclosure Task Force, and Problem Solver make use of the sudden turn of events to launch a counteroffensive against the PMC forces.
desc.jp: Despite the Kaiser director's outrage, Sensei, the Foreclosure Task Force, and Problem Solver make use of the sudden turn of events to launch a counteroffensive against the PMC forces.
desc.zh_cn: 凯萨理事对这意想不到的状况非常气愤。而老师则指挥{cn对策委员会}和便利屋学生对抗PMC士兵。

desc.en: The PMC forces finally retreats following an arduous battle. Later, Sensei seeks out Black Suit personally to negotiate Hoshino's return.
desc.jp: The PMC forces finally retreats following an arduous battle. Later, Sensei seeks out Black Suit personally to negotiate Hoshino's return.
desc.zh_cn: 混战结束后PMC士兵撤退。老师为了寻找解救{cf星野}的方法，直接去找{cf黑色西装人}。

desc.en: The director is both shocked and angry to see that the Problem Solver 68 betrayed them, but the latter insults them back. Sensei confronts the director, demanding that Hoshino be returned. The director doesn't step back. Everyone is forced to engage the enemies.
desc.jp: The director is both shocked and angry to see that the Problem Solver 68 betrayed them, but the latter insults them back. Sensei confronts the director, demanding that Hoshino be returned. The director doesn't step back. Everyone is forced to engage the enemies.
desc.zh_cn: 理事对{cn便利屋68}背叛他们又惊又怒，但便利屋一行人予以了回敬。老师对峙理事，要求将{cf星野}还回来，但后者并未让步。不得已，一行人继续应战。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: That night, Sensei arrives in front of a building. At the top-floor office, Sensei meets the Black Suit.
desc.jp: That night, Sensei arrives in front of a building. At the top-floor office, Sensei meets the Black Suit.
desc.zh_cn: 晚上，老师来到了一幢大楼前。在顶层办公室，老师遇到了黑服。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Black Suit attempts to coerce [USERNAME] Sensei into giving Hoshino up for his experiments, but Sensei makes it perfectly clear that Hoshino will be rescued—no matter what.
desc.jp: Black Suit attempts to coerce [USERNAME] Sensei into giving Hoshino up for his experiments, but Sensei makes it perfectly clear that Hoshino will be rescued—no matter what.
desc.zh_cn: {cf黑色西装人}为了自己的实验，威胁[USERNAME]老师放弃{cf星野}。但是老师不但不放弃，还宣言一定会救出{cf星野}。

desc.en: The Black Suit says he knows quite well about Sensei. In Black Suit's eyes, Sensei is the biggest obstacle and so he doesn't and shouldn't be hostile with Sensei, but rather he should seek cooperation. Sensei asks about his identity, and Black Suit says he is a member of "Gematria". He then asks what Sensei is looking for in Kivotos, but Sensei doesn't listen. The Black Suit adds that, Sensei's behaviour is no longer justified at this time, and he asks whether Sensei even knows well about his rights. He says that Hoshino is no longer a student belonging to Abydos, and mentions about the resignation letter.
desc.jp: The Black Suit says he knows quite well about Sensei. In Black Suit's eyes, Sensei is the biggest obstacle and so he doesn't and shouldn't be hostile with Sensei, but rather he should seek cooperation. Sensei asks about his identity, and Black Suit says he is a member of "Gematria". He then asks what Sensei is looking for in Kivotos, but Sensei doesn't listen. The Black Suit adds that, Sensei's behaviour is no longer justified at this time, and he asks whether Sensei even knows well about his rights. He says that Hoshino is no longer a student belonging to Abydos, and mentions about the resignation letter.
desc.zh_cn: 黑服表示他很了解老师。黑服认为老师的障碍为最大，因而他不想也不应与老师敌对，相反则试图寻求合作。老师询问他的身份，黑服则表示自己是“数秘术”的人，并询问老师究竟在基沃托斯寻求着什么，老师不想岔开话题。黑服继续表示，老师的行为此刻已不具备正当性，询问老师是否明白自己的权利如何。他表示{cf星野}已经不再是{sn阿拜多斯}的学生，并提到了那封退社申请书。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: It turns out there is a column named "Advisor" on the application. And as a teacher invited from Schale, the application is nothing more than a piece of paper if without Sensei's signature. And so Hoshino still belongs to the Foreclosure Task Force, still belongs to Abydos High School, and of course still one of Sensei's students.
desc.jp: It turns out there is a column named "Advisor" on the application. And as a teacher invited from Schale, the application is nothing more than a piece of paper if without Sensei's signature. And so Hoshino still belongs to the Foreclosure Task Force, still belongs to Abydos High School, and of course still one of Sensei's students.
desc.zh_cn: 实际上，申请书上有“顾问”一栏。而作为被从{et夏莱}请来当顾问的老师，不存在老师签名的申请书只是废纸一张，因而{cf星野}仍然属于{cn对策委员会}，仍然属于{sn阿拜多斯}，仍然是自己的学生。

desc.en: The Black Suit gets the idea and disdains such troublesome procedures. Sensei then goes on criticizing the Black Suits, saying they "not only deceive those childrens, tramp their hearts, but also take advantages of their sufferings." The Black Suit doesn't deny the fact that he pursues self-interests, but that's with a clear boundary: the desertification of Abydos isn't their doings, and they are just taking advantages of this disaster.
desc.jp: The Black Suit gets the idea and disdains such troublesome procedures. Sensei then goes on criticizing the Black Suits, saying they "not only deceive those childrens, tramp their hearts, but also take advantages of their sufferings." The Black Suit doesn't deny the fact that he pursues self-interests, but that's with a clear boundary: the desertification of Abydos isn't their doings, and they are just taking advantages of this disaster.
desc.zh_cn: 黑服明白了这点，鄙夷这种麻烦的手续。老师又接着批判黑服，“不但欺骗那些孩子，践踏她们的心，还利用她们的痛苦”。黑服并不否认追求自己利益这一点，但划分了界限：{sn阿拜多斯}的沙漠化并非他们造成，他们只是利用了这一灾难。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: "Those with power exploit those without, those with knowledge exploit those without," Black Suit explains the truth about the world to Sensei. The Black Suit repeats that deal, wanting Sensei to stop interfering them. They promises they will take on half of the debt, and they can keep others at Abydos High School safe and sound. But Sensei rejects it still.
desc.jp: "Those with power exploit those without, those with knowledge exploit those without," Black Suit explains the truth about the world to Sensei. The Black Suit repeats that deal, wanting Sensei to stop interfering them. They promises they will take on half of the debt, and they can keep others at Abydos High School safe and sound. But Sensei rejects it still.
desc.zh_cn: “有权者压榨无权者，有识者压榨无知者，”黑服向老师阐述了这一世间真理。黑服重复了那个提案，让老师放弃干涉他们，由他们承担一半的债务，同时也不会影响{sn阿拜多斯}{sn其他}学生的上学。但老师拒绝了提案。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: The Black Suit cannot comprehend Sensei's choice. He doubts about the ability that Sensei possesses to be enemy with them, and Sensei takes out the Adult's Card - a weapon exclusive to Sensei. But the Black Suit warns Sensei, that the more he use it, the more it will be destroyed, and it will also cost Sensei's life and time. The Black Suit reminds Sensei that he still need to do a lot of daily stuff with it, and mentions again that this has nothing to do with him in the very beginning. Yet Sensei rejects that again.
desc.jp: The Black Suit cannot comprehend Sensei's choice. He doubts about the ability that Sensei possesses to be enemy with them, and Sensei takes out the Adult's Card - a weapon exclusive to Sensei. But the Black Suit warns Sensei, that the more he use it, the more it will be destroyed, and it will also cost Sensei's life and time. The Black Suit reminds Sensei that he still need to do a lot of daily stuff with it, and mentions again that this has nothing to do with him in the very beginning. Yet Sensei rejects that again.
desc.zh_cn: 黑服无法理解老师的选择。他质疑老师与他们敌对的作战能力，老师不得不掏出大人的卡片。这是独属于老师的武器，但黑服也警告称，它越是使用越会被毁灭，会消耗老师的生命与时间。黑服提到老师还需要用它做许多{sn其他}的日常事情，还提到这本就与他无关，但老师仍然拒绝。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: The Black Suit cannot understand Sensei's choice. He asks, questions Sensei, while Sensei just says, "For the sufferings of those children, no one's willing to take the responsibility." The Black Suit is confused, saying that Sensei has neither any kinship nor consanguinity with them, but only an outsider who happened to meet them - and none of the responsibilities should be shouldered by Sensei. Sensei then says, "That's what an adult should do."
desc.jp: The Black Suit cannot understand Sensei's choice. He asks, questions Sensei, while Sensei just says, "For the sufferings of those children, no one's willing to take the responsibility." The Black Suit is confused, saying that Sensei has neither any kinship nor consanguinity with them, but only an outsider who happened to meet them - and none of the responsibilities should be shouldered by Sensei. Sensei then says, "That's what an adult should do."
desc.zh_cn: 黑服无法理解老师的选择。他反问老师、质询老师。老师则表示，“对于那些孩子的痛苦，没有人愿意负责。”黑服不解，表示老师与这些孩子没有任何亲缘和血缘上的关系，只是一个正好遇见他们的外人，这些责任并非老师需要承担。老师则只是表示，“那是大人该做的事”。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.en: The Black Suit now understands and begins to correct Sensei's ideas. "The so-called adults, are the ones who are able to transform the society to one that fits well in their own ideal dream, the ones who make rules, define what's normal or not, who's ordinary or not. The ones who use authority, knowledge and power to govern those without - and that's what I call an adult." The Black Suit stresses that it isn't unrelated to Sensei, as Sensei could have become the ruler of the Kivotos, yet Sensei doesn't. The Black Suit can't get Sensei's intent.
desc.jp: The Black Suit now understands and begins to correct Sensei's ideas. "The so-called adults, are the ones who are able to transform the society to one that fits well in their own ideal dream, the ones who make rules, define what's normal or not, who's ordinary or not. The ones who use authority, knowledge and power to govern those without - and that's what I call an adult." The Black Suit stresses that it isn't unrelated to Sensei, as Sensei could have become the ruler of the Kivotos, yet Sensei doesn't. The Black Suit can't get Sensei's intent.
desc.zh_cn: 黑服理解，但开始纠正老师的想法。“所谓的大人，是能将社会改造成自己理想的样子，制定规则，定义什么是正常与不正常，定义什么是平凡与非凡的人。用权力、知识、力量统治无权者、无知者、无力者的人，那就是大人。”黑服表示这并非与老师无关，老师本也可成为基沃托斯的支配者，但老师并没有选择这么做，黑服不解老师的意图。

desc.en: Sensei says that even speaking out would not make him understood. The Black Suit declares that the negotiation has broken and tells Sensei the location of Hoshino and the content of the experiment at last. The Black Suit ends with "Then you'd be just rescuing your students," contemptuously, and wishes Sensei good luck.
desc.jp: Sensei says that even speaking out would not make him understood. The Black Suit declares that the negotiation has broken and tells Sensei the location of Hoshino and the content of the experiment at last. The Black Suit ends with "Then you'd be just rescuing your students," contemptuously, and wishes Sensei good luck.
desc.zh_cn: 老师表示即使说出，黑服也无法理解。黑服表示交涉决裂，最后告诉了老师{cf星野}的位置与实验内容。黑服最后轻蔑地说了句：“那你就好好拯救学生吧，”并祝老师好运。

desc.en: Before leaving, the Black Suit says they'll be watching on him.
desc.jp: Before leaving, the Black Suit says they'll be watching on him.
desc.zh_cn: 临走前，黑服表示，他们将一直关注着他。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force welcomes Sensei. The all shouts out "Let's rescue Hoshino" loud. Sensei also says that they should "give Hoshino some lessons" and Nonomi agrees that - after all, Hoshino broke her own promise. Sensei even says that they would have lines like "Say to her 'Welcome Back' and should she say 'I Am Back'!"
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force welcomes Sensei. The all shouts out "Let's rescue Hoshino" loud. Sensei also says that they should "give Hoshino some lessons" and Nonomi agrees that - after all, Hoshino broke her own promise. Sensei even says that they would have lines like "Say to her 'Welcome Back' and should she say 'I Am Back'!"
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}的大家欢迎了老师。众人齐声喊出“救出{cf星野}吧！”老师还提到，要“狠狠教训{cf星野}一顿”，{cf野乃美}表示同意，毕竟{cf星野}违背了自己的诺言。老师还说，要“对她说‘欢迎回来’，让她说出‘我回来了’！”这样的台词。

desc.en: The 45th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for Abydos High School. It is often used with members from Abydos High School with situation improving. A notable usage is the strategy planning for rescuing Hoshino.
desc.jp: The 45th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for Abydos High School. It is often used with members from Abydos High School with situation improving. A notable usage is the strategy planning for rescuing Hoshino.

desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: 葛葉過去曾拯救因色彩而陷入危機的聖亞。老師在夢中遇見了擁有被侵蝕的光環的少女，後來他和琳談論這個充滿厄運的夢境。
desc.jp: 葛葉過去曾拯救因色彩而陷入危機的聖亞。老師在夢中遇見了擁有被侵蝕的光環的少女，後來他和琳談論這個充滿厄運的夢境。
desc.zh_cn: 葛叶过去曾拯救因色彩而陷入危机的{cf圣亚}。老师在梦中遇见了拥有被侵蚀的光环的少女，后来他和{cf琳}谈论这个充满厄运的梦境。

desc.en: 聖亞在白日夢中遇到了一個神祕人，後者對她遇到了色彩卻還能保持意識一事感到些許震驚。她表示色彩對基沃託斯的居民就像毒藥般，會將他們的肉體扭曲、侵蝕其精神――雖然不一定致死，但也至少會扭曲成另一個存在。
desc.jp: 聖亞在白日夢中遇到了一個神祕人，後者對她遇到了色彩卻還能保持意識一事感到些許震驚。她表示色彩對基沃託斯的居民就像毒藥般，會將他們的肉體扭曲、侵蝕其精神――雖然不一定致死，但也至少會扭曲成另一個存在。
desc.zh_cn: {cf圣亚}在白日梦中遇到了一个神秘人，后者对她遇到了色彩却还能保持意识一事感到些许震惊。她表示色彩对基沃托斯的居民就像毒药般，会将他们的肉体扭曲、侵蚀其精神――虽然不一定致死，但也至少会扭曲成另一个存在。

desc.en: Kuzunoha is a prophet from Hyakkaryouran Conflict Resolution Council club, who possesses a similar ability with Seia. In the Volume Final, Kuzunoha helped Seia deprive her ability in order to for her to stay safe during the coming incident. She left a message to Sensei stating that there's no cure for Chroma-eroded person and invited Sensei to come to visit her for more details.
desc.jp: Kuzunoha is a prophet from Hyakkaryouran Conflict Resolution Council club, who possesses a similar ability with Seia. In the Volume Final, Kuzunoha helped Seia deprive her ability in order to for her to stay safe during the coming incident. She left a message to Sensei stating that there's no cure for Chroma-eroded person and invited Sensei to come to visit her for more details.
desc.zh_cn: 葛业是来自百花缭乱冲突解决委员会的一名先知，其能力与圣亚类似。在终篇中，葛业帮助圣亚剥夺了后者的能力，以便使其在接下来发生的事件中保持安全。她给老师留下了一条消息，其中声称没有能将色彩侵蚀之人复原的方法，并邀请老师当面与她聊聊。

desc.en: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.jp: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.zh_cn: 圣亚是来自三一茶会的一名学生，具备预见未来的能力（但在最终篇中被葛业剥夺）。她可以在梦中预见未来并与其中的人互动交流。

desc.en: 神祕人回顧了聖亞所經歷的事情，對貝雅特里謝試圖使用色彩力量改變自己一事嗤之以鼻。
desc.jp: 神祕人回顧了聖亞所經歷的事情，對貝雅特里謝試圖使用色彩力量改變自己一事嗤之以鼻。
desc.zh_cn: 神秘人回顾了{cf圣亚}所经历的事情，对{cf贝雅特里谢}试图使用色彩力量改变自己一事嗤之以鼻。

desc.en: Beatrice is an adult of Gematria, who previously the president of Arius Branch School. She's overall a malicious adult and misguided Arius students. She once tried to sacrifice Atsuko and gave away Kivotos' location to Chroma in order to gain power from it, but then failed and directly caused the incidents of Volume Final. She got removed from Gematria due to her action leaking the Kivotos' location, which was seen as a betrayal to the organization.
desc.jp: Beatrice is an adult of Gematria, who previously the president of Arius Branch School. She's overall a malicious adult and misguided Arius students. She once tried to sacrifice Atsuko and gave away Kivotos' location to Chroma in order to gain power from it, but then failed and directly caused the incidents of Volume Final. She got removed from Gematria due to her action leaking the Kivotos' location, which was seen as a betrayal to the organization.
desc.zh_cn: 贝雅特里谢从属于盖玛特利亚的一名大人，此前亦为奥利斯学院的主席。总体而言其意图恶毒并带坏了奥利斯学生。她曾试图以将墩子作为祭品和泄露基沃托斯位置给色彩为代价，试图从后者处获得力量，但最终失败并直接导致了最终篇中的事件。其因泄露位置一事而被认为背叛了盖玛特利亚，遭其众人遗弃。

desc.en: 這時候神祕人才意識到，聖亞僅僅是透過所謂“儀式”的視窗看到而非直接接觸，這樣便保全了自己――但她並不能保證肉體能保持完整。神祕人自稱自己是百鬼夜行的大預言家葛葉，她說能幫助聖亞避開肉體上的問題，但這需要代價。
desc.jp: 這時候神祕人才意識到，聖亞僅僅是透過所謂“儀式”的視窗看到而非直接接觸，這樣便保全了自己――但她並不能保證肉體能保持完整。神祕人自稱自己是百鬼夜行的大預言家葛葉，她說能幫助聖亞避開肉體上的問題，但這需要代價。
desc.zh_cn: 这时候神秘人才意识到，{cf圣亚}仅仅是通过所谓“仪式”的窗口看到而非直接接触，这样便保全了自己――但她并不能保证肉体能保持完整。神秘人自称自己是{sn百鬼夜行}的大预言家{cf葛业}，她说能帮助{cf圣亚}避开肉体上的问题，但这需要代价。

desc.en: Kuzunoha is a prophet from Hyakkaryouran Conflict Resolution Council club, who possesses a similar ability with Seia. In the Volume Final, Kuzunoha helped Seia deprive her ability in order to for her to stay safe during the coming incident. She left a message to Sensei stating that there's no cure for Chroma-eroded person and invited Sensei to come to visit her for more details.
desc.jp: Kuzunoha is a prophet from Hyakkaryouran Conflict Resolution Council club, who possesses a similar ability with Seia. In the Volume Final, Kuzunoha helped Seia deprive her ability in order to for her to stay safe during the coming incident. She left a message to Sensei stating that there's no cure for Chroma-eroded person and invited Sensei to come to visit her for more details.
desc.zh_cn: 葛业是来自百花缭乱冲突解决委员会的一名先知，其能力与圣亚类似。在终篇中，葛业帮助圣亚剥夺了后者的能力，以便使其在接下来发生的事件中保持安全。她给老师留下了一条消息，其中声称没有能将色彩侵蚀之人复原的方法，并邀请老师当面与她聊聊。

desc.en: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.jp: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.zh_cn: 圣亚是来自三一茶会的一名学生，具备预见未来的能力（但在最终篇中被葛业剥夺）。她可以在梦中预见未来并与其中的人互动交流。

desc.en: 葛葉表示，由於色彩會扭曲他們的神祕，因而為了避免被侵蝕，最好就是放棄她具有的預測未來的能力。
desc.jp: 葛葉表示，由於色彩會扭曲他們的神祕，因而為了避免被侵蝕，最好就是放棄她具有的預測未來的能力。
desc.zh_cn: {cf葛业}表示，由于色彩会扭曲他们的神秘，因而为了避免被侵蚀，最好就是放弃她具有的预测{cf未来}的能力。

desc.en: Kuzunoha is a prophet from Hyakkaryouran Conflict Resolution Council club, who possesses a similar ability with Seia. In the Volume Final, Kuzunoha helped Seia deprive her ability in order to for her to stay safe during the coming incident. She left a message to Sensei stating that there's no cure for Chroma-eroded person and invited Sensei to come to visit her for more details.

In the Volume Final, Kuzunoha helped Seia deprive her ability in order to for her to stay safe during the coming incident. She left a message to Sensei stating that there's no cure for Chroma-eroded person and invited Sensei to come to visit her for more details.
desc.zh_cn: 葛业是来自百花缭乱冲突解决委员会的一名先知，其能力与圣亚类似。在终篇中，葛业帮助圣亚剥夺了后者的能力，以便使其在接下来发生的事件中保持安全。她给老师留下了一条消息，其中声称没有能将色彩侵蚀之人复原的方法，并邀请老师当面与她聊聊。

desc.en: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.jp: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.zh_cn: 圣亚是来自三一茶会的一名学生，具备预见未来的能力（但在最终篇中被葛业剥夺）。她可以在梦中预见未来并与其中的人互动交流。

desc.en: 聖亞毫不猶豫的同意了，並在被剝奪的過程中最後一次預見了故事的走向。
desc.jp: 聖亞毫不猶豫的同意了，並在被剝奪的過程中最後一次預見了故事的走向。
desc.zh_cn: {cf圣亚}毫不犹豫的同意了，并在被剥夺的过程中最后一次预见了故事的走向。

desc.en: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.jp: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.zh_cn: 圣亚是来自三一茶会的一名学生，具备预见未来的能力（但在最终篇中被葛业剥夺）。她可以在梦中预见未来并与其中的人互动交流。

desc.en: Kuzunoha is a prophet from Hyakkaryouran Conflict Resolution Council club, who possesses a similar ability with Seia. In the Volume Final, Kuzunoha helped Seia deprive her ability in order to for her to stay safe during the coming incident. She left a message to Sensei stating that there's no cure for Chroma-eroded person and invited Sensei to come to visit her for more details.
desc.jp: Kuzunoha is a prophet from Hyakkaryouran Conflict Resolution Council club, who possesses a similar ability with Seia. In the Volume Final, Kuzunoha helped Seia deprive her ability in order to for her to stay safe during the coming incident. She left a message to Sensei stating that there's no cure for Chroma-eroded person and invited Sensei to come to visit her for more details.
desc.zh_cn: 葛业是来自百花缭乱冲突解决委员会的一名先知，其能力与圣亚类似。在终篇中，葛业帮助圣亚剥夺了后者的能力，以便使其在接下来发生的事件中保持安全。她给老师留下了一条消息，其中声称没有能将色彩侵蚀之人复原的方法，并邀请老师当面与她聊聊。

desc.en: 黑色西裝人、瑪艾斯托洛、戈爾孔特和貝雅特里謝一同參加了會議。黑服在會議上指出自己最近找到了“無名祭司”的遺產，一些由以前的基沃託斯居民所留下的技術，市場價應該相當不錯；但黑服話鋒一轉，指出他這次觀測到了更不可思議的東西：方舟。黑服進一步說，這一切事情其實不應該發生，事情已經脫離了他們的計劃。
desc.jp: 黑色西裝人、瑪艾斯托洛、戈爾孔特和貝雅特里謝一同參加了會議。黑服在會議上指出自己最近找到了“無名祭司”的遺產，一些由以前的基沃託斯居民所留下的技術，市場價應該相當不錯；但黑服話鋒一轉，指出他這次觀測到了更不可思議的東西：方舟。黑服進一步說，這一切事情其實不應該發生，事情已經脫離了他們的計劃。
desc.zh_cn: {cf黑色西装人}、{cf玛艾斯托洛}、{cf戈尔孔特}和{cf贝雅特里谢}一同参加了会议。黑服在会议上指出自己最近找到了“无名祭司”的遗产，一些由以前的基沃托斯居民所留下的技术，市场价应该相当不错；但黑服话锋一转，指出他这次观测到了更不可思议的东西：方舟。黑服进一步说，这一切事情其实不应该发生，事情已经脱离了他们的计划。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Maestro is an adult of Gematria.
desc.jp: Maestro is an adult of Gematria.
desc.zh_cn: 玛艾斯托洛是从属于盖玛特利亚的一名大人。

desc.en: Golconde is an adult of Gematria.
desc.jp: Golconde is an adult of Gematria.
desc.zh_cn: 戈尔孔特是从属于盖玛特利亚的一名大人。

desc.en: Beatrice is an adult of Gematria, who previously the president of Arius Branch School. She's overall a malicious adult and misguided Arius students. She once tried to sacrifice Atsuko and gave away Kivotos' location to Chroma in order to gain power from it, but then failed and directly caused the incidents of Volume Final. She got removed from Gematria due to her action leaking the Kivotos' location, which was seen as a betrayal to the organization.
desc.jp: Beatrice is an adult of Gematria, who previously the president of Arius Branch School. She's overall a malicious adult and misguided Arius students. She once tried to sacrifice Atsuko and gave away Kivotos' location to Chroma in order to gain power from it, but then failed and directly caused the incidents of Volume Final. She got removed from Gematria due to her action leaking the Kivotos' location, which was seen as a betrayal to the organization.
desc.zh_cn: 贝雅特里谢从属于盖玛特利亚的一名大人，此前亦为奥利斯学院的主席。总体而言其意图恶毒并带坏了奥利斯学生。她曾试图以将墩子作为祭品和泄露基沃托斯位置给色彩为代价，试图从后者处获得力量，但最终失败并直接导致了最终篇中的事件。其因泄露位置一事而被认为背叛了盖玛特利亚，遭其众人遗弃。

desc.en: 黑色西裝人和瑪艾斯托洛同時指出，由於貝雅特里謝所執行的“儀式”，色彩可能已經發現了基沃託斯。
desc.jp: 黑色西裝人和瑪艾斯托洛同時指出，由於貝雅特里謝所執行的“儀式”，色彩可能已經發現了基沃託斯。
desc.zh_cn: {cf黑色西装人}和{cf玛艾斯托洛}同时指出，由于{cf贝雅特里谢}所执行的“仪式”，色彩可能已经发现了基沃托斯。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: 戈爾孔特和瑪艾斯托洛指責貝雅特里謝無視色彩可能將帶來的巨大災難，而後者則表示她只不過是想利用色彩的力量罷了。黑服表示同意，但表示目前尚不能斷定色彩究竟發現基沃託斯沒有。貝雅特里謝指出造成他們現在一切問題的就是夏萊的老師，因為這是在他的故事的世界裡，他是無敵的。
desc.jp: 戈爾孔特和瑪艾斯托洛指責貝雅特里謝無視色彩可能將帶來的巨大災難，而後者則表示她只不過是想利用色彩的力量罷了。黑服表示同意，但表示目前尚不能斷定色彩究竟發現基沃託斯沒有。貝雅特里謝指出造成他們現在一切問題的就是夏萊的老師，因為這是在他的故事的世界裡，他是無敵的。
desc.zh_cn: {cf戈尔孔特}和{cf玛艾斯托洛}指责{cf贝雅特里谢}无视色彩可能将带来的巨大灾难，而后者则表示她只不过是想利用色彩的力量罢了。黑服表示同意，但表示目前尚不能断定色彩究竟发现基沃托斯没有。{cf贝雅特里谢}指出造成他们现在一切问题的就是{et夏莱}的老师，因为这是在他的故事的世界里，他是无敌的。

desc.en: 一個未知的地方，下著雨。老師的箱子被白子所破壞，還被白子的槍口對著。白子喃喃著“沒有保護老師的其他辦法了”，開了槍。
desc.jp: 一個未知的地方，下著雨。老師的箱子被白子所破壞，還被白子的槍口對著。白子喃喃著“沒有保護老師的其他辦法了”，開了槍。
desc.zh_cn: 一个未知的地方，下着雨。老师的箱子被{cf白子}所破坏，还被{cf白子}的枪口对着。{cf白子}喃喃着“没有保护老师的{sn其他}办法了”，开了枪。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: 彩奈把老師叫起來，詢問老師是不是又夢到了那個夢。老師仔細看了看她，確認沒受傷後才放心。
desc.jp: 彩奈把老師叫起來，詢問老師是不是又夢到了那個夢。老師仔細看了看她，確認沒受傷後才放心。
desc.zh_cn: {cf彩奈}把老师叫起来，询问老师是不是又梦到了那个梦。老师仔细看了看她，确认没受伤后才放心。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

name.en: 在那時被結束生命的老師
name.jp: 在那時被結束生命的老師
name.zh_cn: 在那时被结束生命的老师

desc.en: 聖亞向老師講述了她預知夢裡的情節：世界的顏色褪去，老師被一個人舉著槍對著，結束了生命。聖亞表示雖然無法準確道出將要發生的時間，但表示這一定和她先前的“基沃託斯的終焉”有關。
desc.jp: 聖亞向老師講述了她預知夢裡的情節：世界的顏色褪去，老師被一個人舉著槍對著，結束了生命。聖亞表示雖然無法準確道出將要發生的時間，但表示這一定和她先前的“基沃託斯的終焉”有關。
desc.zh_cn: {cf圣亚}向老师讲述了她预知梦里的情节：世界的颜色褪去，老师被一个人举着枪对着，结束了生命。{cf圣亚}表示虽然无法准确道出将要发生的时间，但表示这一定和她先前的“基沃托斯的终焉”有关。

desc.en: The future here, seemed to be unforeseeable. Example: Alkaline Tears, Theme 140

desc.zh_cn: 这里的未来，似乎看不到了。举例/联想：Alkaline Tears、第140首曲子

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.zh_cn: 随后老师请求{cf阿罗娜}联系{cf琳}。

desc.en: 老師向琳講述了終焉這件事。雖然兩人都還不太算相信，但琳表示將會盡可能找出這一切的證據，同時確認所謂的“葛葉”是否存在。
desc.jp: 老師向琳講述了終焉這件事。雖然兩人都還不太算相信，但琳表示將會盡可能找出這一切的證據，同時確認所謂的“葛葉”是否存在。
desc.zh_cn: 老师向{cf琳}讲述了终焉这件事。虽然两人都还不太算相信，但{cf琳}表示将会尽可能找出这一切的证据，同时确认所谓的“{cf葛业}”是否存在。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: RABBIT小隊的隊員協助奇普託斯的居民，且在公園繼續生活。另一方面，在奇普託斯的某處舉行了蓋瑪特利亞會議。
desc.jp: RABBIT小隊的隊員協助奇普託斯的居民，且在公園繼續生活。另一方面，在奇普託斯的某處舉行了蓋瑪特利亞會議。
desc.zh_cn: {cnRABBIT小队}的队员协助奇普托斯的居民，且在公园继续生活。另一方面，在奇普托斯的某处举行了{et盖玛特利亚}会议。

desc.en: RABBIT小隊幫助市民解決問題。市民向他們表示感謝，指出在小鎮決定變更行政級別後，許多基礎設施就被拆除，生活不便。RABBIT小隊表示，如有需要就去公園找他們；市民給了他們烤串作為報酬。
desc.jp: RABBIT小隊幫助市民解決問題。市民向他們表示感謝，指出在小鎮決定變更行政級別後，許多基礎設施就被拆除，生活不便。RABBIT小隊表示，如有需要就去公園找他們；市民給了他們烤串作為報酬。
desc.zh_cn: {cnRABBIT小队}帮助市民解决问题。市民向他们表示感谢，指出在小镇决定变更行政级别后，许多基础设施就被拆除，生活不便。{cnRABBIT小队}表示，如有需要就去公园找他们；市民给了他们烤串作为报酬。

desc.en: RABBIT小隊伴著燒旺的柴火，吃著新鮮的烤串，感到生活相當美好。萌還拿出了之前一直放著的汽水和蘑菇。他們的生活愉快而安定。
desc.jp: RABBIT小隊伴著燒旺的柴火，吃著新鮮的烤串，感到生活相當美好。萌還拿出了之前一直放著的汽水和蘑菇。他們的生活愉快而安定。
desc.zh_cn: {cnRABBIT小队}伴着烧旺的柴火，吃着新鲜的烤串，感到生活相当美好。{cf萌}还拿出了之前一直放着的汽水和蘑菇。他们的生活愉快而安定。

desc.en: 聯邦學生會的防衛部部長花耶收到了祕密來電。她提到計劃很快就要開始了。
desc.jp: 聯邦學生會的防衛部部長花耶收到了祕密來電。她提到計劃很快就要開始了。
desc.zh_cn: 联邦学生会的防卫部部长花耶收到了秘密来电。她提到计划很快就要开始了。

desc.en: Kaya is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Kaya is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 花耶是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: 眾人聽了貝雅特里謝的話，大吃一驚。他們指出色彩會將基沃託斯毀於一旦，他們的探究也將付之東流，但貝雅特里謝並不在乎。貝雅特里謝重申，她的目標是為了變成偉大的存在，抹除老師；這一目標遭到眾人一致反對。
desc.jp: 眾人聽了貝雅特里謝的話，大吃一驚。他們指出色彩會將基沃託斯毀於一旦，他們的探究也將付之東流，但貝雅特里謝並不在乎。貝雅特里謝重申，她的目標是為了變成偉大的存在，抹除老師；這一目標遭到眾人一致反對。
desc.zh_cn: 众人听了{cf贝雅特里谢}的话，大吃一惊。他们指出色彩会将基沃托斯毁于一旦，他们的探究也将付之东流，但{cf贝雅特里谢}并不在乎。{cf贝雅特里谢}重申，她的目标是为了变成伟大的存在，抹除老师；这一目标遭到众人一致反对。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Beatrice is an adult of Gematria, who previously the president of Arius Branch School. She's overall a malicious adult and misguided Arius students. She once tried to sacrifice Atsuko and gave away Kivotos' location to Chroma in order to gain power from it, but then failed and directly caused the incidents of Volume Final. She got removed from Gematria due to her action leaking the Kivotos' location, which was seen as a betrayal to the organization.
desc.jp: Beatrice is an adult of Gematria, who previously the president of Arius Branch School. She's overall a malicious adult and misguided Arius students. She once tried to sacrifice Atsuko and gave away Kivotos' location to Chroma in order to gain power from it, but then failed and directly caused the incidents of Volume Final. She got removed from Gematria due to her action leaking the Kivotos' location, which was seen as a betrayal to the organization.
desc.zh_cn: 贝雅特里谢从属于盖玛特利亚的一名大人，此前亦为奥利斯学院的主席。总体而言其意图恶毒并带坏了奥利斯学生。她曾试图以将墩子作为祭品和泄露基沃托斯位置给色彩为代价，试图从后者处获得力量，但最终失败并直接导致了最终篇中的事件。其因泄露位置一事而被认为背叛了盖玛特利亚，遭其众人遗弃。

desc.en: Maestro is an adult of Gematria.
desc.jp: Maestro is an adult of Gematria.
desc.zh_cn: 玛艾斯托洛是从属于盖玛特利亚的一名大人。

desc.en: Golconde is an adult of Gematria.
desc.jp: Golconde is an adult of Gematria.
desc.zh_cn: 戈尔孔特是从属于盖玛特利亚的一名大人。

desc.en: 蓋瑪特利亞遭到謎樣的少女攻擊。將軍召集凱薩SOF，在夏萊的建築物內部做好迎接老師的準備。
desc.jp: 蓋瑪特利亞遭到謎樣的少女攻擊。將軍召集凱薩SOF，在夏萊的建築物內部做好迎接老師的準備。
desc.zh_cn: {et盖玛特利亚}遭到谜样的少女攻击。将军召集凯萨SOF，在{et夏莱}的建筑物内部做好迎接老师的准备。

desc.en: 因為RABBIT小隊的活躍表現，一行人順利奪回夏萊，也順利救出了琳。
desc.jp: 因為RABBIT小隊的活躍表現，一行人順利奪回夏萊，也順利救出了琳。
desc.zh_cn: 因为{cnRABBIT小队}的活跃表现，一行人顺利夺回{et夏莱}，也顺利救出了{cf琳}。

desc.en: 蓋瑪特利亞繼續會議，整理了當前的混亂情況。黑服最後總結要為各種情況做好準備。
desc.jp: 蓋瑪特利亞繼續會議，整理了當前的混亂情況。黑服最後總結要為各種情況做好準備。
desc.zh_cn: {et盖玛特利亚}继续会议，整理了当前的混乱情况。黑服最后总结要为各种情况做好准备。

desc.en: Maestro is an adult of Gematria.
desc.jp: Maestro is an adult of Gematria.
desc.zh_cn: 玛艾斯托洛是从属于盖玛特利亚的一名大人。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Golconde is an adult of Gematria.
desc.jp: Golconde is an adult of Gematria.
desc.zh_cn: 戈尔孔特是从属于盖玛特利亚的一名大人。

desc.en: 就在蓋瑪特利亞眾人談話時，有一位神祕人到訪。

desc.zh_cn: 就在{et盖玛特利亚}众人谈话时，有一位神秘人到访。

desc.en: 將軍在夏萊內做好了準備。

曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.

desc.en: 通訊網終於恢復，老師的手機同時出現了數百封的未讀取訊息。連片刻的喘息時間都沒有，突然響起了令人不舒服的警告聲，從一個名為法蘭西斯的人口中聽見了最後的宣告。
desc.jp: 通訊網終於恢復，老師的手機同時出現了數百封的未讀取訊息。連片刻的喘息時間都沒有，突然響起了令人不舒服的警告聲，從一個名為法蘭西斯的人口中聽見了最後的宣告。
desc.zh_cn: 通信网终于恢复，老师的手机同时出现了数百封的未读取消息。连片刻的喘息时间都没有，突然响起了令人不舒服的警告声，从一个名为{cf法兰西斯}的人口中听见了最后的声明。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 法蘭西斯突然到訪，指出老師的力量將不再發揮作用，因為老師所處的故事的一切已經被推翻、破壞，老師不再是故事的主角。一切都將不復存在，一切都將成為沒有意義而無法理解的世界。他指出老師的故事已經結束，所要發生的將不再是故事。
desc.jp: 法蘭西斯突然到訪，指出老師的力量將不再發揮作用，因為老師所處的故事的一切已經被推翻、破壞，老師不再是故事的主角。一切都將不復存在，一切都將成為沒有意義而無法理解的世界。他指出老師的故事已經結束，所要發生的將不再是故事。
desc.zh_cn: {cf法兰西斯}突然到访，指出老师的力量将不再发挥作用，因为老师所处的故事的一切已经被推翻、破坏，老师不再是故事的主角。一切都将不复存在，一切都将成为没有意义而无法理解的世界。他指出老师的故事已经结束，所要发生的将不再是故事。

desc.en: 老師讓彩奈以夏萊身份聯絡所有人。
desc.jp: 老師讓彩奈以夏萊身份聯絡所有人。
desc.zh_cn: 老师让{cf彩奈}以{et夏莱}身份联络所有人。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: 另一邊，基沃託斯的一切正在被虹色侵蝕。
desc.jp: 另一邊，基沃託斯的一切正在被虹色侵蝕。
desc.zh_cn: 另一边，基沃托斯的一切正在被虹色侵蚀。

desc.en: 阿努比斯的到來讓黑服突然清醒：色彩和無名祭司已經發生了接觸。他認出了阿努比斯，認出了他“恐怖”的一面；後者隨後開槍。
desc.jp: 阿努比斯的到來讓黑服突然清醒：色彩和無名祭司已經發生了接觸。他認出了阿努比斯，認出了他“恐怖”的一面；後者隨後開槍。
desc.zh_cn: 阿努比斯的到来让黑服突然清醒：色彩和无名祭司已经发生了接触。他认出了阿努比斯，认出了他“恐怖”的一面；后者随后开枪。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: 彩奈告訴老師，她已成功聯絡所有學生。
desc.jp: 彩奈告訴老師，她已成功聯絡所有學生。
desc.zh_cn: {cf彩奈}告诉老师，她已成功联络所有学生。

desc.en: 奇普託斯因為突如其來的異常現象而陷入混亂。老師使用大人的卡片企圖收拾眼前的混亂狀況。來歷不明的存在出現在老師面前，並且留下了耐人尋味的忠告。
desc.jp: 奇普託斯因為突如其來的異常現象而陷入混亂。老師使用大人的卡片企圖收拾眼前的混亂狀況。來歷不明的存在出現在老師面前，並且留下了耐人尋味的忠告。
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯因为突如其来的异常现象而陷入混乱。老师使用大人的卡片企图收拾眼前的混乱状况。来历不明的存在出现在老师面前，并且留下了耐人寻味的忠告。

desc.en: 陽奈和亞子發現天空變紅。
desc.jp: 陽奈和亞子發現天空變紅。

desc.en: 優香詢問乃愛關於莉音的蹤跡，後者表示還沒有找到。優香表示自己將先出發一步。
desc.jp: 優香詢問乃愛關於莉音的蹤跡，後者表示還沒有找到。優香表示自己將先出發一步。
desc.zh_cn: {cf优香}询问{cf乃爱}关于{cf莉音}的踪迹，后者表示还没有找到。{cf优香}表示自己将先出发一步。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 花子聽說有急事後來到茶會所在的陽臺，見到了茶會的渚、修女會的櫻子和救援騎士團的美禰。花子希望大家能夠一起齊心協力，即便派系不同。
desc.jp: 花子聽說有急事後來到茶會所在的陽臺，見到了茶會的渚、修女會的櫻子和救援騎士團的美禰。花子希望大家能夠一起齊心協力，即便派系不同。
desc.zh_cn: {cf花子}听说有急事后来到{cn茶会}所在的阳台，见到了{cn茶会}的{cf渚}、{cn修女会}的{cf樱子}和救援骑士团的{cf美祢}。{cf花子}希望大家能够一起齐心协力，即便派系不同。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.jp: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，尤其用于阿里乌斯(奥利斯)分校的学生。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: 完成任務的眾人發現天空變紅了。就在這時他們收到老師的訊息。

desc.zh_cn: 完成任务的众人发现天空变红了。就在这时他们收到老师的消息。

desc.en: 詩音向電視螢幕前的所有人報道稱，DU白鳥區出現不明情況，有一個巨大的塔從天空落下且正中聖所之塔。隨後是一些現場的情況。
desc.jp: 詩音向電視螢幕前的所有人報道稱，DU白鳥區出現不明情況，有一個巨大的塔從天空落下且正中聖所之塔。隨後是一些現場的情況。
desc.zh_cn: 诗音向电视屏幕前的所有人报道称，DU白鸟区出现不明情况，有一个巨大的塔从天空落下且正中圣所之塔。随后是一些现场的情况。

desc.en: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.jp: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.zh_cn: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。

desc.en: 站在夏萊的頂樓上，老師遇見了黑色西裝人。黑服說他所在的組織已被摧毀，而色彩將“胡狼神”扭曲為“阿努比斯”反轉為其恐怖的一面，而後者也遵循著其命運的指導，給基沃託斯帶來終結。
desc.jp: 站在夏萊的頂樓上，老師遇見了黑色西裝人。黑服說他所在的組織已被摧毀，而色彩將“胡狼神”扭曲為“阿努比斯”反轉為其恐怖的一面，而後者也遵循著其命運的指導，給基沃託斯帶來終結。
desc.zh_cn: 站在{et夏莱}的顶楼上，老师遇见了{cf黑色西装人}。黑服说他所在的组织已被摧毁，而色彩将“胡狼神”扭曲为“阿努比斯”反转为其恐怖的一面，而后者也遵循着其命运的指导，给基沃托斯带来终结。

realname.en: !⸮ WAS IT A CAT I SAW ?!
realname.jp: !⸮ WAS IT A CAT I SAW ?!

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: 黑服表示，自己雖然先前認為色彩沒有意識、無法理解，但在這次行動中，他們卻明顯感覺到色彩具有了意識和意義――色彩試圖吸收基沃託斯所有崇高和神祕的概念，將其化為己有。
desc.jp: 黑服表示，自己雖然先前認為色彩沒有意識、無法理解，但在這次行動中，他們卻明顯感覺到色彩具有了意識和意義――色彩試圖吸收基沃託斯所有崇高和神祕的概念，將其化為己有。
desc.zh_cn: 黑服表示，自己虽然先前认为色彩没有意识、无法理解，但在这次行动中，他们却明显感觉到色彩具有了意识和意义――色彩试图吸收基沃托斯所有崇高和神秘的概念，将其化为己有。

realname.en: !⸮ WAS IT A CAT I SAW ?!
realname.jp: !⸮ WAS IT A CAT I SAW ?!

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: 黑服表示，出現在基沃託斯的六座塔大概可以算作是聖所之塔的一種變體，其將會把色彩的光散播到整個基沃託斯，扭曲所有人。
desc.jp: 黑服表示，出現在基沃託斯的六座塔大概可以算作是聖所之塔的一種變體，其將會把色彩的光散播到整個基沃託斯，扭曲所有人。
desc.zh_cn: 黑服表示，出现在基沃托斯的六座塔大概可以算作是圣所之塔的一种变体，其将会把色彩的光散播到整个基沃托斯，扭曲所有人。

realname.en: !⸮ WAS IT A CAT I SAW ?!
realname.jp: !⸮ WAS IT A CAT I SAW ?!

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: 黑服表示，自己的組織受到色彩攻擊，可能是由於色彩想要奪走他們的技術。他提到他們稱代表色彩意志的存在為“色彩的嚮導者”，其名為“誘騙者”。
desc.jp: 黑服表示，自己的組織受到色彩攻擊，可能是由於色彩想要奪走他們的技術。他提到他們稱代表色彩意志的存在為“色彩的嚮導者”，其名為“誘騙者”。
desc.zh_cn: 黑服表示，自己的组织受到色彩攻击，可能是由于色彩想要夺走他们的技术。他提到他们称代表色彩意志的存在为“色彩的向导者”，其名为“诱骗者”。
